title: cant buy champs now??? full BE price on pbe?
body: why are champs the full BE price now on the pbe... with the lag and fact every champ is free to play the chance of getting lots of be will take forever.. and are we still getting rp and blue essence every day?.. that's kinda the point of the pbe.. we cant test skins and such if we cant purchase them.. and we cant really explore the new rune system either.. if we have only a certain amount of rp,,, as we cant purchase rune pages ... we shouldn't have to pay money to get rp on a test server.. and i haven't seen any information anywhere about it..

replies.body:
PBE servers change relatively often to make sure people are able to test certain things that we're needing to check out. You can still purchase skins, even if they aren't all 1 BE or all currently available. 

Be sure to forward any PBE Feedback over to the [**PBE Boards**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/6KrtEEwg-1018-daily-pbe-status-faq) so that they can be answered and taken into consideration!
the issue is i cant... the pbe forums arent supported on my server.. so i cant post on the pbe forum page.. also are we still getting rp and be everyday or do we have to buy rp on a test server?
